title: Video Modeling-Based Instructional Design for Probability Calculation Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic statistical concepts and college-level mathematics
context.additional_context: Case-centered education considering practical applicability for current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply conditional probability calculation methods with 80% accuracy to solve given probability problems.
Learners can correctly construct probability distribution models three or more times by analyzing real-life cases.
Learners can explain complex probabilistic relationships using visualization techniques presented in video modeling.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
